turn.10: Faculty of Health and Social Studies: Initially, it started as a part of the Faculty of Education but starting the next academic year 1991/1992 it became a separate faculty.

turn.12: The faculty has total of 7 academic departments with an official motto of "We teach people to help." Faculty of Science: Established in 1991, the faculty is a successor of the Faculty of Biological Sciences (which was based on the Biology Centre of Academy of Sciences of the Czech Republic) and houses 12 academic departments.
